title: Academic Analytics LLC
paragraphs: A business supporting higher education and academic research through data analysis, discovery, and growing connections.
bullets: Collaborated as a software developer on a remote, cross-functional team of 9 developers, analylists, and managers.
Contributed updates to internal software and programatically assembled and analyzed over half a million academic articles.

Implemented enhancements and bugfixes to legacy ASP.NET and WinForms software, maintained utilities automating dataset updates, and managed deployement of web utilities for analysts and contracted workers around the world.

Enhanced analyst workflow and data input with improved data validation checks, new workload queue data forms, further automation of common tasks, enhanced search results and dataset downloads, and faster loading with more optimized stored procedures and table indexing.

Utilized C#, Python, JavaScript, ASP.NET, Knockout, Sencha Ext JS, XLST/XPath, Regular Expression, TFVC, Git, Azure DevOps, SQL Server Management Studio, Visual Studio, Microsoft Teams, and other technologies to collaboratively develop internal software and utilities.
